text: The system for the maintenance of the official personnel folder established under § 1-631.01 shall provide for the transfer of folders between agencies of the District government subject to this chapter when employees transfer from 1 agency to another.
historical:

DC CODE § 1-631.07

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Records Management and Privacy of Records.
